Relative and absolute wind
==================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 6-26

.. code-block:: Python


    from datetime import timedelta
    from opendrift import test_data_folder as tdf
    from opendrift.readers import reader_netCDF_CF_generic
    from opendrift.models.oceandrift import OceanDrift

    o = OceanDrift(loglevel=20)  # Set loglevel to 0 for debug information

    # Arome
    reader_arome = reader_netCDF_CF_generic.Reader(tdf +
        '16Nov2015_NorKyst_z_surface/arome_subset_16Nov2015.nc')
    #reader_arome = reader_netCDF_CF_generic.Reader('https://thredds.met.no/thredds/dodsC/mepslatest/meps_lagged_6_h_latest_2_5km_latest.nc')

    # Norkyst
    reader_norkyst = reader_netCDF_CF_generic.Reader(tdf +
        '16Nov2015_NorKyst_z_surface/norkyst800_subset_16Nov2015.nc')
    #reader_norkyst = reader_netCDF_CF_generic.Reader('https://thredds.met.no/thredds/dodsC/fou-hi/norkystv3_800m_m00_be')

    o.add_reader([reader_norkyst, reader_arome])

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-28

Seeding some particles

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-32

.. code-block:: Python

    lon = 4.2; lat = 60.0; # Outside Bergen
    time = [reader_arome.start_time,
            reader_arome.start_time + timedelta(hours=30)]








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 33-34

Using windspeed relative to moving ocean (current)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 34-37

.. code-block:: Python

    o.set_config('drift:relative_wind',  False)
    o.set_config('drift:vertical_mixing', False)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 38-39

Seed oil elements at defined position and time

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 39-43

.. code-block:: Python

    o.seed_elements(lon, lat, radius=50, number=5000, time=time)

    o.run(steps=48*2, time_step=1800, time_step_output=3600*2)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 44-45

Second run, for comparison

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 45-53

.. code-block:: Python

    o2 = OceanDrift(loglevel=20)  # Set loglevel to 0 for debug information
    o2.add_reader([reader_norkyst, reader_arome])
    o2.set_config('drift:relative_wind',  True)
    o2.set_config('drift:vertical_mixing', False)
    o2.seed_elements(lon, lat, radius=50, number=5000, time=time)
    o2.run(steps=48*2, time_step=1800, time_step_output=3600*2)

    </dd><dt><span>geospatial_bounds_crs :</span></dt><dd>EPSG:4326</dd><dt><span>geospatial_bounds_vertical_crs :</span></dt><dd>EPSG:5831</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lat_min :</span></dt><dd>59.98239</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lat_max :</span></dt><dd>60.9663</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lat_units :</span></dt><dd>degrees_north</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lat_resolution :</span></dt><dd>point</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lon_min :</span></dt><dd>4.0760336</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lon_max :</span></dt><dd>4.716351</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lon_units :</span></dt><dd>degrees_east</dd><dt><span>geospatial_lon_resolution :</span></dt><dd>point</dd><dt><span>runtime :</span></dt><dd>0:00:03.593555</dd><dt><span>geospatial_vertical_min :</span></dt><dd>0.0</dd><dt><span>geospatial_vertical_max :</span></dt><dd>0.0</dd><dt><span>geospatial_vertical_positive :</span></dt><dd>up</dd></dl></div></li></ul></div></div>
    </div>
    <br />
    <br />

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 54-55

Animate and compare the two runs

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 55-57

.. code-block:: Python

    o.animation(compare=o2, legend=['Absolute wind', 'Relative wind'])





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

    09:00:41 INFO    opendrift:4560: Saving animation to /root/project/docs/source/gallery/animations/example_relative_0.gif...
    09:01:01 INFO    opendrift:3001: Time to make animation: 0:00:31.931538




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 58-59

.. image:: /gallery/animations/example_relative_0.gif

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 59-61

.. code-block:: Python


    o.plot(compare=o2, legend=['Absolute wind', 'Relative wind'], fast=True)
